quotes.quote: Each event is preceded by prophecy. But, without the hero, there is no event.
quotes.author: Zurin Arctus

quotes.quote: It is better to walk than curse the road.
quotes.author: Senegalese proverb

quotes.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
quotes.author: Marie Curie
